statements: SELECT * FROM two_factor_authentication;
SELECT username, phone_number FROM two_factor_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, otp_secret FROM two_factor_authentication WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT user_id, username, phone_number FROM two_factor_authentication ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM two_factor_authentication;
SELECT * FROM two_factor_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, phone_number FROM two_factor_authentication WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT user_id, username, phone_number, otp_secret FROM two_factor_authentication WHERE user_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM two_factor_authentication WHERE otp_secret IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT(username) AS 'User', COUNT(*) AS 'Count' FROM two_factor_authentication GROUP BY username HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM two_factor_auth WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT u.username, t.token FROM users u JOIN two_factor_auth t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE u.user_id = 3;
SELECT u.user_id, t.token, t.expires_at FROM users u INNER JOIN two_factor_auth t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.expires_at > NOW();
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM sessions ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT user_id, method FROM authentication_logs WHERE method = 'password';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT session_id, user_id, created_at FROM sessions ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT users.username, authentication_logs.timestamp FROM users JOIN authentication_logs ON users.user_id = authentication_logs.user_id WHERE authentication_logs.method = 'login' ORDER BY authentication_logs.timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sessions, MAX(created_at) AS latest_session FROM sessions;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE expiration_time > NOW();
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT backup_code FROM backup_codes WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT code_id, created_at FROM sms_codes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT users.username, sms_codes.sms_code FROM users JOIN sms_codes ON users.user_id = sms_codes.user_id;
SELECT user_id, count(*) FROM backup_codes GROUP BY user_id HAVING count(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT device_type, serial_number FROM devices WHERE device_type='Phone';
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM login_attempts WHERE login_success = true;
SELECT * FROM login_history LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Smartphone' AND user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM login_attempts WHERE login_success = true ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT u.username, d.device_type, l.login_success FROM users u JOIN devices d ON u.user_id = d.user_id JOIN login_attempts l ON u.user_id = l.user_id WHERE u.user_id = 3 AND d.device_type = 'Laptop';
